settings.title: Shipping
settings.content: flat rate $7 shipping for every order!

settings.title: True to the Fruit
settings.subtext:
more fruit. more flavor.
less sugar. no pectin.

settings.title: Picked for Perfection
settings.subtext:
handcrafted in small batches
each one tested for perfection

settings.title: California Citrus
settings.subtext:
hand-peeled, never blanched
or soaked for more flavor

settings.title: Texture you can taste
settings.subtext:
whole fruit cooked down for
flavor you can feel

settings.title: Talk about your brand
settings.content: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.testimonial:
Jamnation – damn good jam

“Some jams are meant to be exclaimed over particularly if they taste anything like Jamnation’s In the Limelight… freighted with whole strawberries… the citrus lends bright, puckery dimension to the fruit making a jam that’s as lively as it is lovely.”
settings.name: Rebecca Marx

settings.testimonial: “Holy smokes! Just let me throw my face in a bowl of that [Sublemonal Message]!”
settings.name: Mary-Louise S

settings.testimonial: “This [Midnight in Pearis] tastes like Christmas!”
settings.name: Chris K
